parttens: what is the difference between hnd and btech
responses:
HND is a two years program after which the student can do a one year top-off program and
get their bachelors while B-Tech is a straight three years program for thesame bachelors
HND stands for Higher Nationl Deploma while B-Tech stands for Bachelors in technology

B-Tech can only be undertaken by individuals with pass marks in maths and physics,
while HND can be undertaken by individuals of pass marks in two avance level subjects excluding religious study
